articles.author: Jenni Fink
articles.title: American in Wuhan Says if He Had 'Magic Crystal Ball' He Would Have Left Before Coronavirus Quarantine
articles.description: He won't leave his girlfriend, who isn't a U.S. citizen, in Wuhan, but looking back, he would have gotten out with her before officials locked the city down.
articles.content: Doug Perez, a San Francisco native working in Wuhan, China, doesn't regret giving up his spot on an evacuation plane to stay with his girlfriend. But, if he could have seen the future, he would have had them both leave before officials locked the city down be… [+4461 chars]

articles.title: How Far Away Is a Coronavirus Vaccine?
articles.description: Over 200 people have died since 2019-nCoV emerged in China late last year.
articles.content:
Scientists are racing to develop a new vaccine to prevent the spread of a mysterious novel coronavirus that has killed 213 people. However, a shot could still be years away and likely won't make a dent on the current outbreak, experts have told Newsweek.

articles.title: Coronavirus Treatment and Vaccine Could Be a Step Closer Thanks to Antibody Which Can Neutralise 2019-nCoV
articles.description: The new virus has killed over 213 people in almost 10,000 cases.
articles.content:

articles.title: Latest on Coronavirus: Timeline of Events Since the Start of the Outbreak in China
articles.description: The novel coronavirus was first detected in people living in Wuhan, China, in December, and has since infected thousands of people.
articles.content:

articles.title: Michael Stipe Says He Once Told Donald Trump to 'Shut Up' at a New York Gig: 'The Guy Got Up And Left'
